"The Skill Tree":
"The Skill Tree is a system in which you assign Skill Points to learn Class Skills.

※Skill Points can be reassigned an unlimited number of times.
※Class Skills indicated with \"SP 0\" can be learned without assigning any Skill Points to them."
"If two Class Skills are connected by a line, you cannot learn the Class Skill at the bottom of the line until you have learned the one above it."
